basics.name: Hjalte Bested Hjorth
basics.label: Creative Technologist, Robotics Engineer, Composer and Musician
basics.summary: I am a visionary creative technologist, merging the worlds of robotics, art, and music into transformative experiences. From engineering intricate mechanical instruments to composing immersive soundscapes, I thrive on turning bold ideas into tangible realities. My work reflects an unyielding passion for innovation, collaboration, and the magic of creating something extraordinary.

work.name: MAN Energy Solutions
work.summary: Developed control systems for emissions-reducing subsystems on large-scale engines. Played a pivotal role as software architect, optimizing scalability and efficiency, and managing large-scale version control through Git.
highlights: Designed control systems in C++ for distributed control systems.
Handled major Git merge processes and restructured codebase for scalability.

work.name: Tromleorkestret
work.summary: Co-founded an interactive music and art project using a custom-built, robotic music machine. Designed and built unique robotic instruments, composed music, and performed internationally.
highlights: Created the Robotic Slide Bass and other mechanical instruments.
Performed at events like BIG BANG Festival and Badesøen Festival.

work.name: RMC | Rytmisk Musikkonservatorium
work.summary: Teaching the course "Composer as Designer," focusing on music system design, generative approaches, and real-time interaction using sensors and coding.

work.name: Teater Fantast
work.summary: Composed and produced music and sound design for the play "DATA-DATA."

work.name: Science & Cocktails
work.summary: Designed interactive installations and performed generative music pieces at the intersection of science and art.

volunteer.summary: Managed annual Christmas Eve events at Den Grå Hal, Christiania, providing a free celebration for over 1,200 attendees. Oversaw technical setup, program coordination, and volunteer management.
highlights: Directed a team of 100+ volunteers to execute seamless events.
Ensured inclusivity and community spirit through thoughtful programming.

projects.name: Interactive Learning Games
projects.summary: Developed interactive educational tools showcasing energy distribution using hardware and visual models.
highlights: Designed installations for Norfors Besøgscenter and Refa Energispil.
Integrated LEDs, control panels, and 10-inch screens for hands-on learning.

projects.name: FOO/SKOU Interactive Art
projects.summary: Collaborated with FOO/SKOU to build sensor-based installations merging art and technology.
highlights: Developed embedded systems and real-time audio DSP.
